count.description: The number of individuals in the target population.

f_max.description: The maximum fitness for the population.

f_mean.description: The mean fitness for the population.

f_min.description: The minimum fitness for the population.

s_max.description: The maximum survivability for the population.

s_mean.description: The mean survivability for the population.

s_min.description: The minimum survivability for the population.

e_max.description: The maximum evolvability for the population.

e_mean.description: The mean evolvability for the population.

e_min.description: The minimum fitness for the population.

g_max.description: The maximum generation for the population.

g_mean.description: The mean generation for the population.

g_min.description: The minimum generation for the population.

gcc_max.description: The maximum number of GC's making up any individual.

gcc_mean.description: The mean number of GC's making up any individual.

gcc_min.description: The minimum number of GC's making up any individual.

cc_max.description: The maximum number of codons making up any individual.

cc_mean.description: The mean number of codons making up any individual.

cc_min.description: The minimum number of codons making up any individual.

eps.description: The number of evolutions per second.

worker_id.description: The ID of the worker writing this row.

created.description: The time at which the population statistics were calculated. This is the end of the target population epoch.
